snippet: Mitt Romney makes his final pitch in Canton, Ohio ahead of the Super Tuesday primaries, when 437 delegates from 10 states are at stake. Ashley Parker reports.
abstract: Mitt Romney makes his final pitch in Canton, Ohio ahead of the Super Tuesday primaries, when 437 delegates from 10 states are at stake. Ashley Parker reports.

byline.original: By BEN WERSCHKUL and VIJAI SINGH
